house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1955 has 4 bedroom(s), 6 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Basement, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Contemporary Style, Dishwasher,Eat In Kitchen, Game Room, Garage Door Opener, Gazebo, Guest Room,Kitchen Island, Library, Microwave, Pantry, Tennis Court(s), Wet Bar
